mainText:
Thank you for my childhood. Thank you for the butterflies we all felt waitin
g to hear from you what is next. Thank you for our adulthood and making the impossible possible and making fun out of the mundane. Thank you for being re
volutionary and showing us how to be evolutionary. Thank you for encouraging
 us to stand on your shoulders, for you are a historic giant. You Mr. Jobs, Simply Work.
author: DiAnna
